features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: High-level overview of platform statistics including users, instructors, students, and companies.

features.name: Admin Analytics & Reports
features.description: Comprehensive platform insights and performance metrics including revenue, student growth, and course performance.

features.name: Course Management
features.description: Ability for admins to review, approve, reject, unpublish, and delete courses.

features.name: Payment Management
features.description: Admin interface for monitoring transactions, processing refunds, and viewing financial statistics.

features.name: User Management
features.description: Admin control over user roles, permissions, and profiles.

features.name: Bundle Management
features.description: Creating and managing course bundles with special pricing and discounts.

features.name: Company Management
features.description: Managing corporate accounts and B2B learning packages.

features.name: FAQ & Blog Management
features.description: Admin interfaces for managing platform-wide FAQs and blog content.
